name: Eat My Chunder
description:
A chunder-powered racer made for Barfcade.

Eat shrimp for fuel, unleash powerful chunder thrusts to keep ahead of your opponent, but don't let them ride your chunder slipstream for too long!

By Dylan Bevis

n.b. 'Chunder' is Australian for vomit for those not in the highly exclusive chunder loop.
